https://tmrev.io/movie/936454-Camuni 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dBxm5GgYHaNcDcv07ICQLYy81cR.jpg A man sees a woman and falls in Iove. To win her heart, he embarks upon a courtship involving fire-lit tribal dances, a perilous deer hunt and demonstrations of his virility. The only thing that unlocks her heart, however, is a flower, the “Camunian rose”, which he plucks from the rock and gives to her as a sign of his love. Camuni
